oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ohio Monument near Missionary Ridge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of an unidentified woman and child standing in front of the Ohio Monument near Missionary Ridge in Chattanooga. There is a cannon in the foreground. Features a white border, undivided back, and handwritten correspondence on both sides. September 21, 1906 and September 22, 1906 postmarks.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials; Cannons; Women; Children
